Guarantee. The Guarantor hereby unconditionally and absolutely guarantees to each of the Beneficiaries and their respective successors and assigns the full and prompt payment of all amounts due and owing by the Borrowers under the Loan Agreement, as and when they shall become due thereunder (the “Guaranteed Obligations”). The Guarantor shall deliver the Shortfall Amount to the Agent, for the benefit of the applicable Beneficiary, in immediately available funds no later than one (1) Business Day after such notice is received.
